verses.roman:
praṇavera yei artha, gāyatrīte sei haya
sei artha catuḥ-ślokīte vivariyā kaya

synonyms: praṇavera—of the sound vibration, oṁkāra; yei—whatever; artha—meaning; gāyatrīte—in the Gāyatrī mantra; sei—that; haya—there is; sei artha—that same meaning; catuḥ-ślokīte—in Śrīmad-Bhāgavatam summarized in four ślokas; vivariyā—describing elaborately; kaya—has said.
translation: "The meaning of the sound vibration oṁkāra is present in the Gāyatrī mantra. The same is elaborately explained in the four ślokas of Śrīmad Bhāgavatam known as catuḥ-ślokī.
